divs: Sighting Details Was returning from lunch around noon, clear skywith some higher clouds. Was looking up to monitor stack emmissions for workand noticed the object tracking south to north. Noticed unusual colors, nowings, tail or fusilage and moving very slowly. It looked like a multifacetedprism surrounded by a bubble. As I watched it moving north, it suddenly made a90 degree turn east without decelerating as if on an electrical grid. Objecttracked west approximately 30 seconds and stopped completely. It hovered forabout 15 seconds and shot off in a southeasterly direction at an incredible rateof speed. This led me to believe that this was not a manned craft. Also theflight dynamics were like nothing I had observed before given my militarybackground.
Summary: Saw a metallic ball eminating multiple colors at d
